name: BurgerOfHanoi
description:
❔What is this game?

This is an entry for TriJam #146, created in 2h51m using Crisp-game-lib.
To be honest, it's buggy.

💬Synopsis

You are a strange flying saucer from outer space, and somehow the earth has become strange too! Run through the mountains of burgers!

📚Rules
  • Stack the abducted burger ingredients in the same order as the target to get a score!
  • If you hit the ingredients, you die.
🔍Credits
  • Game engine: Crisp-game-lib
  • Sound: Automatic generation by Crisp-game-lib
  • Translate this document: DeepL
  • Other tools: VSCode
